gofumpt -w foo.go .
cmp foo.go foo.go.golden

-- foo.go --
package p

import "single-line"

import (
	"too-verbose"
)

import (
	"multiple-imports-1"
	"multiple-imports-2"
)

var single = "foo"

const (
	verbose = "bar"
)

type (
	multiple1 string
	multiple2 string
)
-- foo.go.golden --
package p

import "single-line"

import "too-verbose"

import (
	"multiple-imports-1"
	"multiple-imports-2"
)

var single = "foo"

const verbose = "bar"

type (
	multiple1 string
	multiple2 string
)
